title.rendered: How to Find What’s on Trending? Most Popular Tools for Finding Trending

content.rendered:
The world of the internet, precisely, social media is always in constant change. What is trending today might not be trending tomorrow. So, if you are planning to get involved in some sort of content marketing, or you are already doing it, it is essential to know what is trending. This way you can produce content that will be relevant and interesting to your audience.

Table of Contents

Toggle

    • 1. Your brand will be relevant:
    • 2. You will attract more attention:
    • 3. You will get more traffic:
    • 4. You will build relationships:

  • Wrapping up!
  • FAQs
    • Q. What is the best way to find out what is trending?
    • Q. What is the best way to find out what is trending on social media?
    • Q. How can I find out what is trending in a specific country?
    • Q. Why should businesses care about what is trending?
    • Q. What are the benefits of following trending topics?

Why are following trends important for a brand?

The answer is simple – to be relevant. People are always interested in what is new, what everybody else is talking about. And if your brand is not a part of that conversation, you are missing out on a great opportunity. There are several benefits of being up to date with the latest trends:

1. Your brand will be relevant:

This is the most important reason, and it was already mentioned – to be relevant. By creating content about trending topics, you are making your brand a part of that conversation. People will start to see you as an authority on the subject, and they will be more likely to come to you for information in the future.

2. You will attract more attention:

If you are creating content about something that is trending, you are more likely to get noticed. More people will see your content, and if it is good, they will share it. This way you will attract new readers, and maybe even new customers.

3. You will get more traffic:

More attention also means more traffic; if you are lucky, and your content goes viral, you will get a lot of visitors to your website or blog. Of course, this is not something that happens all the time, but it is a possibility.

4. You will build relationships:

When you are creating content about something that is trending, you will have an opportunity to connect with other people who are interested in the same thing. You can start a discussion, and maybe even build some relationships that will be beneficial for your business.

Popular tools to find what’s trending

Now that you know why following trends is important, let’s take a look at some of the most popular tools for finding out what is trending:

1. Google Trends

One of the most popular and well-known tools for finding out what is trending is Google Trends. This tool lets you see how often particular terms are being searched for on the internet. You can use it to compare the popularity of different terms over time or to see how popular a term is in different parts of the world.

Google Trends is a great tool for finding out what is trending because it is based on real data. The terms that you see being searched for the most are the ones that are currently trending. The way you use Trends is quite simple. You just enter a term that you want to search for, and it will show you how popular that term is.

If you want to compare the popularity of two terms, you can do that by entering both terms into the Google Trends search bar.

2. Exploding Topics:

This is an excellent tool for finding out what is trending on social media. It uses data from Twitter to show you the topics that are being talked about the most at any given moment. The way it works is quite simple.

You just enter a term into the search bar, and it will show you a list of related topics. The topics are sorted by how popular they are, so you can quickly see which ones are trending the most.

If you want to see more information about a particular topic, you can click on it, and it will show you a list of tweets that mention that topic.

It’s more of a business-purpose tool, but it can be used for general interest as well. Many founders, marketing teams, and social media managers use Exploding Topics to keep up with the latest trends and to find out what people are talking about.

3. SparkToro Trending:

It’s more focused on SEO and technology-based trends and it is a very accurate tool. The site uses data from Twitter, Reddit, Google, and other sources to show you what’s trending.

Just like Google Trends, you can enter a term and see how popular it is. You can also compare the popularity of the two terms side-by-side. One of the great things about SparkToro is that it not only shows you what is trending but also why it is trending. This can be really helpful in understanding what people are interested in and why.

To use SparkToro, simply enter a term into the search bar and it will show you how popular it is. You can also click on the ‘Why is this trending?’ link to find out more about why a particular term is trending. It takes the factor of the number of social shares, media attention, and online search interest into account.

4. FrontPageMetrics:

It’s a popular Reddit thread used to find out what is trending. This thread is full of links to articles and videos that are currently trending. It’s a great way to stay up-to-date with what’s happening in the world, and it’s also a great place to find new content to consume.

One downside of FrontPageMetrics is that it can be hard to find the most recent thread. But, if you search for “FrontPageMetrics” on Reddit, you should be able to find it. As the Reddit community is quite active, the thread is usually updated frequently.

You can access this thread to virtually find any topic that is happening in the world. The best part about it is that you can find content related to the topic very easily. With over 3 million subreddits, this is one of the largest communities on the internet and it definitely knows what’s trending.

5. Feedly:

Feedly is a tool that lets you see the latest articles from your favorite websites and blogs all in one place. You can use it to keep up with the latest news and trends in your industry.

To use Feedly, you first need to create an account and then add the RSS feeds of the websites and blogs that you want to follow. Once you have done that, you will see the latest articles from those websites in your Feedly feed. You can then read the articles that interest you and save them for later.

Feedly is a good tool for those who want to stay up-to-date with the latest trends in their industry but don’t have the time to visit all of their favorite websites and blogs individually. Moreover, if you’re into content marketing, Feedly can help you curate content for your blog or website.

6. Podcast Notes:

Another great way to find out what is trending is by listening to podcasts. This is a great way to stay up-to-date on current trends because you can listen to them while you are doing other things, such as driving or working out.

There are many different podcasts that discuss current trends. Some of the most popular ones include The Daily Show, NPR, and TED Talks. To find podcasts that discuss current trends, you can use iTunes or a similar service.

This is a useful tool for finding out what is trending because it allows you to stay up-to-date on current trends without having to dedicate a lot of time to research. As the podcast industry is gaining 10% new users every year, it is becoming an increasingly popular way to consume content.

If you’re planning to launch your podcast, it’s a great tool to save time because you can quickly understand what’s currently popular in the space and make an educated decision about your show topics.

7. Buzzsumo:

Another great tool for finding out what is trending is Buzzsumo. This tool lets you see the most popular content that has been shared on social media. You can use it to see what content is being shared the most on Twitter, Facebook, LinkedIn, and other social media platforms.

Buzzsumo is a great tool for finding out what is trending because it gives you an overview of the most popular content that has been shared on social media. This can help you to identify trends in the content that is being shared.

To use Buzzsumo, you just need to enter a term into the search bar. It will then show you the most popular content that has been shared on social media platforms. You can also get details about the users who have shared the content. All in all, Buzzsumo is a great tool for identifying trends in social media content.

8. Trends.co

If you’re looking for a tool that is specifically designed for finding out what is trending on social media, then Trends.co is a good option. This tool lets you see what topics and hashtags are being talked about the most on social media platforms such as Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram.

The advantage of using Trends.co is that it can help you to identify trends that are specific to social media. This can be useful if you want to target your content toward a social media audience. The best part about this tool is that it breaks down the topic into multiple details so that you can understand what people are saying about it. This can be helpful in understanding why a particular topic is trending.

To use Trends.co, you simply enter a term into the search bar and it will show you how popular that term is on social media. You can also use the tool to compare the popularity of different terms.

9. Treendly

Treendly is another tool that you can use to find out what is trending. This tool is similar to Google Trends in that it lets you see how popular different terms are. However, it also has some other features that make it a bit more user-friendly.

For example, Treendly allows you to filter the results so that you only see the most popular topics. This can be useful if you want to focus on a particular topic area. Treendly also has a feature that lets you see the top trending topics in different countries. This is helpful if you want to see what is trending in a specific country or region.

To use Treendly, you just need to sign up for a free account. Once you have an account, you can start searching for trends. Treendly offers a better user interface than Google Trends and is definitely worth checking out.

10. Product Hunt Topics:

Product Hunt is a website that curates the best new products and services. It has a very active community of users who submit and vote on submissions. The submissions with the most votes rise to the top of the homepage.

The site also has a number of different topics that you can follow. Following these topics is a great way to stay up-to-date with the latest trends. To find the trending topics on Product Hunt, simply go to the Topics page and take a look at the ones that are currently being followed the most.

You can also subscribe to receive notifications whenever new products are added to a particular topic. This is a great way to make sure you never miss a trending product. Moreover, it’s a community where people post their digital products and people can subscribe and be updated whenever there is a new product posted on that topic.

Wrapping up!

As you can see, there are a number of different tools that you can use to find out what is trending. Each tool has its own unique features and advantages. Try out a few of these tools and see which ones work best for you.

FAQs

Q. What is the best way to find out what is trending?

Ans. The best way to find out what is trending is to use a tool like Google Trends or Treendly. These tools allow you to see how popular different terms are.

Q. What is the best way to find out what is trending on social media?

Ans. The best way to find out what is trending on social media is to use a tool like Trends.co. This tool lets you see what topics and hashtags are being talked about the most on social media platforms such as Twitter.

Q. How can I find out what is trending in a specific country?

Ans. The best way to find out what is trending in a specific country is to use a tool like Google Trends. This tool has a feature that lets you see the top trending topics in different countries.

Q. Why should businesses care about what is trending?

Ans. Businesses should care about what is trending because it can give them insights into what consumers are interested in.

Q. What are the benefits of following trending topics?

Ans. Some benefits of following trending topics include staying up-to-date with the latest trends, getting insights into what consumers are interested in, and finding new products and services.
